name: Cockroach Survival
description:
Cockroach Survival is our first game non-professional team from Thailand.
This game made for 20Second Game Jam so gameplay is limit to maximum 20second u must be survive for 20second long trying to dodge the "Madness Vacuum Cleaner" and win the game.
Thank you for interested our game.  Good luck have fun !!

How to Play
W A S D or Arrow Key for Move
Space bar or Left-Click to Restart (While Game Over) 
Just dodge enemy and survive for 20second !!

Team member
Polpanu Serajit - Developer | Game Design
Staryu Jongjumroenwong (Pa-Dow)  - Artist | Character&Environment Design
Chawakorn Tongkhamkhaw (DelsinSkip) - Artist | Character&Environment Design
